title: The pope is in fashion, but his views are wrong
content:
P ope Francis has enjoyed a high-spirited welcome in the United States. The infectiously likable pope kissed babies along his parade route in Washington, D.C., and performed a soaringly beautiful mass at the Basilica of the National Shrine there. 
  
He is an endearingly charismatic figure, but judging by his highly anticipated speech before a joint session of Congress, not exactly an orator.
